desc: Works on chain link fences, back stop nets and poles. Designed to work with all GoPro cameras, action cameras and cell phones. Build to last by athletes for baseball, softball, tennis and other sports.

layout.text: The Original Chain Link Fence Mount

Designed and built by athletes.
Fence Dad & Fence Mom action camera mounts have been designed to get you off the fence and let you enjoy the game. Works with all GoPro, action cameras, Mevo Start live streaming cameras and cell phones.
